pages.text: To make it easier to see what crops have what seasons in this chapter, the following icons are used:$(li)🌼 §2Spring$(li)🔥 §6Summer$(li)🍂 §4Autumn$(li)❆ §bWinter$(li)🌐 §5Year-round

pages.title: Growth Duration
pages.text: $(li)Grow Time: Crop grows at 6:00 AM.$(li)Grow Stages: Crop randomly grows.
